summary: This document is a mortgage loan application correspondence addressed to Brian Vickers from Fifth Third Mortgage. It includes a request for Brian to review the enclosed documents related to his mortgage loan application and provides contact information for further inquiries.

persons.name: Brian Vickers
persons.context: Brian Vickers is the recipient of the mortgage loan application correspondence from Fifth Third Mortgage.

persons.name: Loartith Brown
persons.context: Loartith Brown is the sender of the correspondence and is identified as the Mortgage Loan Originator for Fifth Third Mortgage.

connections.description: Brian Vickers is the client applying for a mortgage loan, and Loartith Brown is the service provider facilitating the loan application process.

locations: 329 Seats e eze Ave, Palm Beach, FL 33480
435 S Tryon Street WOO, Charlotte, NC 28202
keyFacts: The document is a mortgage loan application correspondence dated October 3, 2014.
Brian Vickers is applying for a mortgage loan.
Loartith Brown is the Mortgage Loan Originator handling the application.
The correspondence includes a request for Brian to review enclosed documents.
The document mentions that loans are subject to credit review and approval.
